trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 노출 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> 유형를 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 선택 키를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*> 호출

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 선택 키의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 컨트롤 형식을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*> 호출

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 자식 요소 컬렉션을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*> 호출

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 자식 요소의 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이름을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*> 호출

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "MenuItem".
trans-unit.target: "MenuItem"을 포함 하는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 레이블을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*> 호출

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: Name 속성은 사용자가 참조 되는 컨트롤을 설명 하기 위해 사용 하는 텍스트 문자열으로 생각할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 모든 컨트롤에 대 한 텍스트 표현이 해야는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 지역화 된 방식으로 컨트롤을 프로그래밍 방식으로 참조할 수 있도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: 레이블이 포함 된 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 패턴을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 다음과 같은 경우 중 하나가 발생할 경우 현재 반환 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>이와 연결 된 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>에 자식 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>개체.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> does not have child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>이와 연결 된 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>에 자식 없는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>개체.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>이와 연결 된 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>로 설정 된 확인 가능한 속성에 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `patternInterface` 같음 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>를 구현 하는 개체를 반환 하는이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider>인터페이스.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 열거형 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 컨트롤 패턴을 지원 하는 개체 patternInterface 지원 되는 값이 고, 그렇지 않으면, 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식 또는 멤버 지원는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 인프라 하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The toggle state of the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 설정/해제 상태입니다.
